Jayco.warranty_summary: Jayco states that its towable products include a 2-year limited warranty and a 3-year structural warranty. Jayco also states that its motorhome limited warranty coverage is 24 months or 24,000 miles, whichever comes first.
coverage_notes: Warranty terms can vary by product line and model year; confirm details in the applicable warranty guide for your specific RV.
For motorized units, Jayco states the limit includes a mileage cap (24,000 miles) in addition to time.
